https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null "The solitary image of the black male figure whistling and enveloped by fog appears to be a song of departure from the charnel house of the racial sublime. But this does not mean it will disappear completely, since race and masculinity still have social meaning." -Okwui Enwezor Cloudscape
